docs.snippet: Turkey's EU Minister Omer Celik said on Wednesday changing the country's anti-terror laws would pose a threat to its security, reiterating Ankara's position that Brussels should not expect it to change its stance....

docs.snippet: Euro zone countries should retreat from the euro single currency and return to a "common currency" structure, French National Front leader Marine Le Pen said on Wednesday, evoking the era of the ECU basket of currencies....
docs.lead_paragraph: Euro zone countries should retreat from the euro single currency and return to a "common currency" structure, French National Front leader Marine Le Pen said on Wednesday, evoking the era of the ECU basket of currencies.

headline.print_headline: France's Le Pen Proposes Return to ECU-Style System to Replace Euro

docs.snippet: Investment banking fees fell 7 percent worldwide in 2016, dragged down by a 23 percent fall in equity capital market (ECM) fees, Thomson Reuters data showed on Wednesday, raising the pressure on banking giants fighting to restore profitability....
